song.title: No Other Name
song.lyrics:
[1] .B E B E F#m E B C#m One Name holds weight above them all .B E B E F#m E B C#m His fame outlasts the earth He formed || .E A E A B A E/G# C#m His praise resounds beyond the stars . E A And echoes in our hearts .E A B A E C#m A The greatest One of all
[C] . E Lift up our eyes and see the King has come . C#m Light of the world reaching out for us . E/G# There is no other Name . A There is no other Name . C#m A Jesus Christ our God . E Seated on high the undefeated One . C#m Mountains bow down as we lift Him up . E/G# There is no other Name . A There is no other Name . C#m A Jesus Christ our God --- [2] .B E B E F#m E B C#m His face shines brighter than the sun .B E B E F#m E B C#m His grace as boundless as His love || .E A E A B A E C#m He reigns with healing in His wings . E A The King above all kings .E A B A E C#m A The greatest One of all
[3] .B E B E F#m E B C#m Find hope when all the world seems lost .B E B E F#m E B C#m Behold the triumph of the cross .E A E A B A E/G# C#m His power has trampled death and grave . E A Our life found in His Name .E A B A E C#m A The greatest Name of all
[B] . E The earth will shake . And tremble before Him .C#m Chains will break . As heaven and earth sing .A Holy is the Name .A C#m Holy is the Name of Jesus . A Jesus, Jesus
